Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes

  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.localsearch.planner.cost.ICostEstimator
    This is used by LocalSearchPlannerStrategy. Use the LocalSearchRuntimeBasedStrategy and its belonging components instead.
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.patternlanguage.emf.types.IEMFTypeProvider
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.localsearch.operations.IMatcherBasedOperation
    Do not use this interface
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.rete.eval.CachedFunctionEvaluatorNode
    Use OutputCachingEvaluatorNode (non-abstract since 1.5) with EvaluationCore.
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.rete.eval.CachedPredicateEvaluatorNode
    Use OutputCachingEvaluatorNode (non-abstract since 1.5) with EvaluationCore.
    org.eclipse.viatra.dse.api.DSETransformationRule
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.patternlanguage.emf.types.EMFPatternTypeProvider
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.localsearch.matcher.integration.LocalSearchHintKeys
    removed support in version 1.5; use LocalSearchHintOptions
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.localsearch.planner.LocalSearchPlannerStrategy
    Use the LocalSearchRuntimeBasedStrategy and its belonging components instead.
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.extensibility.QuerySpecificationRegistry
    Use QuerySpecificationRegistry.getInstance() and read notes on deprecated methods for usage.
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.base.itc.alg.incscc.UnionFind
    Use superclass from runtime.matchers plug-in instead.
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.base.itc.alg.incscc.UnionFindNodeProperty
    Use superclass from runtime.matchers plug-in instead.
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.localsearch.planner.cost.impl.VariableBindingBasedCostEstimator
    This is used by LocalSearchPlannerStrategy. Use the LocalSearchRuntimeBasedStrategy and its belonging components instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.localsearch.matcher.integration.LocalSearchHintKeys.ALLOW_INVERSE_NAVIGATION
    removed support in 1.4; its uses will be ignored
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.matchers.psystem.rewriters.PBodyNormalizer.calcImpliedTypes
    redefine in a subclass PBodyNormalizer.shouldCalculateImpliedTypes(PQuery) instead
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.rete.util.ReteHintOptions.checkScopeBoundaries
    Use the base index option DANGLING_FREE_ASSUMPTION_DEFAULT instead.
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.rete.eval.AbstractEvaluatorNode.evaluator
    use EvaluationCore
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.emf.EMFQueryMetaContext.INSTANCE
    use EMFQueryMetaContext.DEFAULT
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.rete.eval.AbstractEvaluatorNode.logger
    use EvaluationCore
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.rete.eval.AbstractEvaluatorNode.runtimeContext
    use EvaluationCore

    Method and Description
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.matchers.planning.helpers.BuildHelper.areAllVariablesDetermined(SubPlan, Collection<PVariable>, IQueryMetaContext)
    use BuildHelper.areAllVariablesDetermined(SubPlan, Collection, QueryAnalyzer, boolean)
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.matchers.planning.helpers.BuildHelper.areVariablesDetermined(SubPlan, Collection<PVariable>, Collection<PVariable>, IQueryMetaContext)
    use BuildHelper.areVariablesDetermined(SubPlan, Collection, Collection, QueryAnalyzer, boolean)
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.emf.EMFQueryRuntimeContext.ensureIndexed(EClass)
    use EMFQueryRuntimeContext.ensureIndexed(EClass, IndexingService) instead
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.emf.EMFQueryRuntimeContext.ensureIndexed(EDataType)
    use EMFQueryRuntimeContext.ensureIndexed(EDataType, IndexingService) instead

    use EMFQueryRuntimeContext.ensureIndexed(EStructuralFeature, IndexingService) instead

    use ensureIndexed(IInputKey, IndexingServices) instead

    use EvaluationCore
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.matchers.backend.QueryEvaluationHint.getBackendHints()
    As of 1.5, string keys are no longer available. Use QueryHintOption instead
    org.eclipse.viatra.dse.util.EMFHelper.getClassesAndReferences(Collection<EPackage>)

    Use new PackageBasedQueryGroup(String packageFQN).getSpecifications() instead

    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.extensibility.QuerySpecificationRegistry.getQuerySpecification(String)

    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.localsearch.matcher.integration.LocalSearchHints.isAllowInverse()
    allow inverse was deprecated in 1.4; its uses are ignored
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.matchers.context.IQueryRuntimeContext.isIndexed(IInputKey)
    use IQueryRuntimeContext.isIndexed(IInputKey, IndexingService) instead

    use NavigationHelper.registerObservedTypes(Set, Set, Set, IndexingLevel) instead
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.extensibility.QuerySpecificationRegistry.registerQuerySpecification(IQuerySpecification<? extends ViatraQueryMatcher<? extends IPatternMatch>>)
    Register your own IRegistrySourceConnector through #addSource instead to add and remove specifications.
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.tooling.core.project.ProjectGenerationHelper.replaceBundledependencies(IProject, Map<String, String>, Map<String, VersionRange>, IProgressMonitor)
    Misspelled method, call ProjectGenerationHelper.replaceBundledependencies(IProject, Map, Map, IProgressMonitor) instead.
    org.eclipse.viatra.dse.util.EMFHelper.serializeModel(EObject, String, String)
    Use EMFHelper.saveModel(Notifier, String) instead.

    allow inverse was deprecated in 1.4; its uses are ignored

    use BuildHelper.trimUnneccessaryVariables(SubPlanFactory, SubPlan, boolean, QueryAnalyzer)

    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.rete.eval.AbstractEvaluatorNode.tupleFromResult(Tuple, Object)
    use EvaluationCore
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.extensibility.QuerySpecificationRegistry.unregisterQuerySpecification(String)
    Register your own IRegistrySourceConnector through #addSource instead to add and remove specifications.
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.base.api.BaseIndexOptions.withWildcardMode(boolean)
    use BaseIndexOptions.withWildcardLevel(IndexingLevel) instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.rete.eval.AbstractEvaluatorNode(ReteContainer, Logger, IExpressionEvaluator, Map<String, Integer>, int)
    use EvaluationCore
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.base.api.BaseIndexOptions(boolean, boolean)
    use BaseIndexOptions.BaseIndexOptions(boolean, IndexingLevel) instead. Use IndexLevel.FULL for wildcardMode equivalent to true.
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.api.impl.BaseMatcher(ViatraQueryEngine, IQuerySpecification<? extends BaseMatcher<Match>>)
    Since 1.4, generated code uses BaseMatcher.BaseMatcher(IQuerySpecification)
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.matchers.psystem.basicdeferred.ExportedParameter(PBody, PVariable, String)
    Use ExportedParameter.ExportedParameter(PBody, PVariable, PParameter) instead
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.api.GenericPatternMatcher(ViatraQueryEngine, GenericQuerySpecification<? extends GenericPatternMatcher>)
    use GenericPatternMatcher.GenericPatternMatcher(GenericQuerySpecification) instead
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.rete.eval.MemorylessEvaluatorNode(ReteContainer, Logger, IExpressionEvaluator, Map<String, Integer>, int)
    use EvaluationCore
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.rete.eval.OutputCachingEvaluatorNode(ReteContainer, Logger, IExpressionEvaluator, Map<String, Integer>, int)
    use EvaluationCore
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.patternlanguage.typing.judgements.ParameterTypeJudgement(Expression, Expression)
    Use ParameterTypeJudgement.ParameterTypeJudgement(Expression, Variable) instead
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.matchers.psystem.rewriters.PBodyCopier(PBody)
    use PBodyCopier.PBodyCopier(PBody, IRewriterTraceCollector) instead
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.matchers.psystem.rewriters.PBodyNormalizer(IQueryMetaContext, boolean)
    redefine in a subclass PBodyNormalizer.shouldCalculateImpliedTypes(PQuery) instead
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.matchers.backend.QueryEvaluationHint(IQueryBackendFactory, Map<String, Object>)
    As of 1.5, use QueryEvaluationHint.QueryEvaluationHint(Map, IQueryBackendFactory) instead. String-keyed hint setting map will be ignored.
    org.eclipse.viatra.query.runtime.rete.construction.plancompiler.ReteRecipeCompiler(IQueryPlannerStrategy, Logger, IQueryMetaContext, IQueryCacheContext, IQueryBackendHintProvider)
    use ReteRecipeCompiler.ReteRecipeCompiler(IQueryPlannerStrategy, Logger, IQueryMetaContext, IQueryCacheContext, IQueryBackendHintProvider, QueryAnalyzer)
